label: Given
documentation: Given steps are used to describe the initial context of the system - the scene of the scenario. It is typically something that happened in the past.

label: actions
documentation: actios keyword is used to perform the series for interactions require for given scenrios

label: Then
documentation: Then steps are used to describe an expected outcome, or result. The step definition of a Then step should use an assertion to compare the actual outcome (what the system actually does) to the expected outcome (what the step says the system is supposed to do).

label: And
documentation: If you have successive Givens, Whens, or Thens, you could write: Then

label: do
documentation: do perform some interact which work on components or starting test

label: click
documentation: click on component by interacting with its given identifier

label: type
documentation: type on component by interacting with its given identifier by providing its value
